howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to get an AI-optimized CV

step1.title: Upload Your CV
step1.description: Add your current CV text via OCR (PDF, Word, Image) or copy-paste

step2.title: Add Description
step2.description: Paste the complete job description you're applying for

step3.title: AI Optimization
step3.description: Our AI enriches your CV with metrics and adapts it to the position

step4.title: Download
step4.description: Download your optimized CV as PDF and apply with confidence

generate.title: Generate Optimized CV
generate.subtitle: Follow the steps to create your AI-optimized CV

step1.title: Step 1: Choose Your Template
step1.subtitle: Select the CV design that best matches your professional profile

step2a.title: Step 2a: Upload Your CV (Optional)
step2a.subtitle: Accepted formats: PDF, Word (.doc, .docx), Images (PNG, JPG, JPEG)

step2b.title: Step 2b: Your CV Text
step2b.subtitle: The text will be automatically filled if you uploaded a file, otherwise paste it here
step2b.placeholder: Paste your current CV text here or it will be filled automatically after upload...

step3.title: Step 3: Job Description
step3.subtitle: Paste the complete job description you're applying for. The more detailed, the better the result!
step3.placeholder: Paste the complete job description here...

step4.title: Generating Your Optimized CV
step4.subtitle: Our AI is working to create your perfect CV...
step4.successMessage: Your CV has been optimized and is ready to download
step4.redirecting: CV generated successfully! Redirecting to history in 3 seconds...
